name: Zachary's Memory (post jam)
description:
Zachary is arrived at the end of his life and he remembers.

His memories  mix. You are the memory's archiver, and you have to sort them.
You have to type on your keyboard to create a label and sort a memory. Some of them are linked and need to have the same label, but be carefull, every memory lost will make Zachary forget about the memory story.
